==== Settings Files for BAR_VERTICAL Charts ====

===== Settings:barvertical =====
Settings file available at : [[Settings:barvertical | Settings:barvertical]]
Plot a variable in a vertical bar chart. Example:

====== Example Chart ======

<img src="../images/help/BAR_VERTICAL-settings.PNG" width="1024px" />

====== Code ======
<source>
{{ #widget : BarChart
  | query = '
    SELECT ?org (COUNT(?project) AS ?countProjects) WHERE { 
      ?org rdf:type <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Organization> .
      ?org rdfs:label ?label .
      ?org <http://research.data.gov.uk/def/project/project> ?project
    FILTER regex(?label, "^Te.*Ltd$") }
    GROUP BY ?org'
  | input = 'org'
  | output = {{ 'countProjects' }}
  | height = '400'
  | type = 'BAR_VERTICAL'
  | settings = 'Settings:barvertical'
}}
</source>
